x0.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the startingx-values of the line segments

y0.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the startingy-values of the line segments

x1.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the stoppingx-values of the line segments

y1.description: A numeric vector or unit object indicating the stoppingy-values of the line segments

plot.description: Input plotgardener plot to internally plot line segmentsrelative to

default.units.description: A string indicating the default units to useif \code{x0}, \code{y0}, \code{x1}, or \code{y1} are only givenas numeric vectors

linecolor.description: A character value specifying segment line color

lwd.description: A numeric specifying segment line width

lty.description: A numeric specifying segment line type

lineend.description: A character value specifying line end style

linejoin.description: A character value specifying line join style

arrow.description: A list describing arrow heads to place at eitherend of the line segments, as produced by the \link[grid]{arrow} function

params.description: An optional \link[plotgardener]{pgParams} object containingrelevant function parameters
